      • IteratorMapclass

        public IteratorMapclass(mapObject[][] map,
                        int rowCount,
                        int colCount)
        it will set the variable map as the same as the param map; the rowCount will have the same value as the param rowCount; the colCount will have the same value as the param colCount; rowCurr will start at zero; colCurr will start at zero;
        Parameters:
        map - array of mapObjects;
        rowCount - total of rows in that array;
        colCount - total of columns in that array;
